title: Navaratan Inspired Gemstone Cascade Necklace
materials: Diamond Simulants. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A modern take on the traditional Kasulaperu (coin necklace), this piece features a cascade of organically shaped, bezel-set mixed gemstones encircled by sparkling diamond simulants. Each gemstone is carefully selected and arranged to create a mesmerizing color palette. The necklace is handcrafted for exceptional durability and comfortable wear.
colors: White (Diamond Simulants). The variety of colors in the gemstones evokes the vibrancy of a South Indian festival.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Can be worn with both traditional silk sarees and modern dresses.
description: This necklace is a unique blend of modern design and traditional inspiration, creating a timeless piece that you'll treasure for years to come. The mixed gemstones symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful gift or a valuable addition to your own collection. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures that the gold retains its shine for years to come. The cascade design provides a flattering and eye-catching silhouette.
